name: CPT. Fishbowl
description:
CPT. Fishbowl is a game I've been working on since Feb 2021  this is still a very early in development.

But if you're looking for a fast rougelike with random loot you should have some fun with this, right now I have only two bosses and a handful of levels

I haven't been able to test it on too many Window builds.

there also seem to be some issue with window not giving permission to open the .exe  for some people, not sure how to stop it but I added a zip file if the installer is giving issue.

There unfortunately will be bugs.
known bugs:

-continuing current run after restarting game can cause crash.

-odd clipping with enemies and terrain.

-landing on a block at a very specific angle does an odd  teleport to the player.

uploaded new  exe. hopefully  item droop glitch
